customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Carta animata vuota
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Jadeplume Terrorshroom's Parade

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "It is said that in the depths of the forest, there is a great being at the apex of all Fungi..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Jadeplume Terrorshroom" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Proliferating Spores" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Jadeplume Terrorshroom

value.name: Fungostro Cresta di giada
value.desc:
Questa bestia fungina dalle notevoli dimensioni ha subito varie mutazioni nel corso degli anni fino ad assumere una sua forma caratteristica.
La sua intelligenza ha già raggiunto, e forse superato, quella dei comuni animali, e vede nella caccia la sua principale fonte di sostentamento. La sua coda è caratterizzata da uno splendido piumaggio color giada, molto simile a quello dell'antica bestia sacra onorata dalla scuola di Spantamad. Stando ai principi della mimesi, sembra molto probabile che, anticamente, entrambi gli esseri camminassero sulla terra insieme.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , then consumes all <color=#ffffff>Radical Vitality</color> stacks. For each stack consumed, this instance deals +1 DMG.
<color=#ece5d8>Radical Vitality</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
When this character deals or takes Elemental DMG: Gain 1 stack of Radical Vitality. (Max 3 stacks)
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : If Radical Vitality stacks reach maximum, they will be cleared and the character will lose all Energy.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Radical Vitality</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Radical Vitality</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
When this character deals or takes Elemental DMG: Gain 1 stack of Radical Vitality. (Max 3 stacks)
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : If Radical Vitality stacks reach maximum, they will be cleared and the character will lose all Energy.

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro/Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
